content: with forest green make a magic_ring or ch3 and slip_stitch to first chain a rnd1 6sc in magic_ring a rnd2 single_crochet around 6sc rnd3 scinc around 12sc rnd4-rnd5 single_crochet around 12sc rnd6 *scinc single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x in total 18sc rnd7-rnd8 single_crochet around 18sc rnd9 in bl only single_crochet around 18sc b rnd10 *decrease single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x in total 12sc finish off b rnd1-rnd8 repeat a rnd9 *scinc single_crochet in next 2st repeat from * 6x in total 24sc rnd10-rnd11 single_crochet around 24sc c rnd12 in bl only single_crochet around 24sc rnd13 *decrease single_crochet in next 2st repeat from * 6x in total 18sc rnd14 *decrease single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x in total 12sc finish off c rnd1-rnd11 repeat b rnd12 *scinc single_crochet in next 3st repeat from * 6x in total 30sc rnd13-rnd14 single_crochet around 30sc rnd15 in bl only single_crochet around 30sc rnd16 *decrease single_crochet in next 3st repeat from * 6x in total 24sc rnd17 *decrease single_crochet in next 2st repeat from * 6x in total 18sc rnd18 *decrease single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x in total 12sc finish off d pattern in bl only single_crochet around 36sc rnd19 *decrease single_crochet in next 4st repeat from * 6x in total 30sc rnd20 *decrease single_crochet in next 3st repeat from * 6x in total 24sc rnd21 *decrease single_crochet in next 2st repeat from * 6x in total 18sc rnd22 *decrease single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x in total 12sc finish off tree trunk with black coffee make a magic_ring or ch3 and slip_stitch to first chain rnd1 9sc in magic_ring rnd2 scinc around 18sc rnd3 in bl only single_crochet around 18sc rnd4 single_crochet around 18sc rnd5 *decrease single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x in total 12sc rnd6-11 single_crochet around 12sc fill lightly with fiber filling finish off but leave a long end assembly 1 single_crochet or stitch the tree trunk to part d 2 stack the tree parts from large to small you can choose to stitch all part together 3 you can make other variations of this pine tree with apple granny make the small tree 2x part d with # the slim tree is
